variable.name: DTHRVWD
variable.description: DEATHS REVIEWED BY EVENTS REVIEW COMMITTEE.
variable.value: DATE OF DEATH HAS NOT BEEN CONFIRMED
DEATH IS CONFIRMED AND IN THE SOE FILE

variable.name: DTHTIME
variable.description: TIME FROM EXAM 1 TO DATEDTH (DATE OF DEATH) (DAYS)

variable.name: LATTTIME
variable.description: TIME FROM EXAM 1 TO LASTATT (DATE OF LAST FHS EXAMINATION) (DAYS)

variable.name: LCONTIME
variable.description: TIME FROM EXAM 1 TO LASTCON (DATE OF LAST CONTACT (VIA TELEPHONE OR IN PERSON OR THROUGH MAIL) BY PARTICIPANT OR TRACKING) (DAYS)

variable.name: LSOETIME
variable.description: TIME FROM EXAM 1 TO LASTSOE (DATE OF PARTICIPANT'S LAST NON-DEATH EVENT IN SOE (SEQUENCE OF EVENTS) FILE) (DAYS)
